reviews.review: It's Half-life. What did you expect?
The story WILL draw you in.  and as for the conclusion... hehehehe, play and find out!  ^-^
Half-Life games are made every century.
I dont normally like FPS's this and the new Doom games and the exeptions.
One of the few perfect games that exist.
Buen juego para pasar el rato, Lo recomiendo  10/10
It's Half-Life. By default, that means it's a beautiful creation with great characters and great story-telling.

I can't believe I slept on this for so long. I bought Half-Life 2 waaaaaay back in 2013, but I never played it until now. I totally get why people say Half-Life 2 is the greatest FPS of all time. I don't think I would go so far as to say it's the BEST, but it's certainly up there. Half-Life 2 felt like so many other FPSs I've played before while somehow feeling incredibly fresh. Despite releasing in 2004, it still absolutely holds up in so many ways. My very few complaints are that some chapters are too long, slightly overstaying their welcome, as well as some rare difficulty spikes. Also, I loved the story, but the ending really left me wanting. I guess now I gotta play Episode One and Episode Two. Anyway, Half-Life 2 is a near masterpiece and a game that everyone with a Steam account must play. If you're on the fence like I was, please, hop the fuck off and play this!

An amazing story that takes you throughout this sci-fi world; visiting countless locations with excellent scenery. Great Characters, great story, fun gameplay. 10/10

oyun tek kelime ile harika açıklamıycam eksikleri çünkü yok artıları yazmak baya zor tek isteğim bir valve index half life alyx oynamak______________________oyun_güzel______________________________________________

Enfin j'ai pu jouer à Half Life 2 après tant d'années! Avec un scénario avec pas mal d'intrigue, le joueur est propulsé dans ce monde de chaos ou vous devrez soutenir des rebelles face à l'emprise du Cratel. San oublier l'action! Des moments intenses au moment ou il faut faire travailler son cerveau. Je dois avouer qu'avoir la compagnie d'Alix change, on se sent moins seul. Half Life 2 a été une très grande surprise pour moi et je ne regrette pas du tout.
great storyline. new to half life games but easy to pick up on overall great game
Ахуенный сюжет, гейплей и вообще ахуенно
how CAN'T you play this game??!!

Half life 2 is no doubt one of the best games ever made, but over time its age is starting to show. With small physics  puzzles that while were crazy for the time are kinda of done to death now a days. The  enemy's AI is also a weak spot with them just charging at you instead of using any kind of tactics. The story while great still feel's like a step back from the openness of the original Half Life. Instead of being who you want Gordon to be you're instead forced to be what Valve wants Gordon too be. Again the story direction is fine, with a great use of subtlety, but it's a little disappointing considering Valve could have done anything with the story here. 

All and all great game though.
Loved the gun play and would recommend! Wish steam didn't count hours where I left the game open but no complaints about the game.
El juego es mas gustado toda mi infancia, y si recomiendo a los que no probó, porfavor probarlo

It keeps crashing the graphic card driver. The manifests itself as a short stuttering and then the display stops to update. You can quick-save and then exit to restart where you left off, but it's incredibly frustrating. Highway 17 is particularly bad.

Un, voir LE meilleur jeu auquel j'ai joué dans ma vie !
Il a tout pour plaire : des graphisme qui ont pas si mal vieillit; une bande son avec sa propre identitée, des personnages mémorables, une ambiance incroyablement immersive, un univers sombre mais fascinant, Une physique ouf et un gameplay qui ferait rougir les triple A de nos jours.
En point negatif, je pourrais relever la vf qui est au fraise à certain moment (genre Alyx qui n'y met pas du sien)

Vraiment, je conseil ce jeu à n'importe quel joueur qui aime le fps
Has the best story of all games that I've already played

The greatest game in the history.

Many years later - Still insist on this
